    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BucketHeadZombie
    Tough zombie wearing a bucket that greatly increases its durability.
    Cherrybomb
    Explosive plant that damages all zombies in a 3x3 area around it.
    ConeheadZombie
    Zombie equipped with a cone that provides additional defence at the cost of speed.
    FlagZombie
    Faster zombie variant that acts as a wave indicator.
    FreezePeashooter
    Variant of the peashooter that freezes zombies it hits.
    Game
    Central game controller that orchestrates all other controllers and manages the overall game state.
    GameBoard
    Utility class responsible for rendering the state of the board in the console.
    GameBoardGUI
    Swing based GUI that visually represents the game board and handles user interactions such as clicking tiles and selecting plants.
    GameEventListener
    Listener interface for game events such as entity deaths, creation, and sun generation.
    LevelSelectorGUI
    Simple window that lets the user choose which level to play before starting the actual game.
    MusicPlayer
    Utility class for playing short audio clips in a loop for background music.
    NormalZombie
    Standard zombie with average attributes.
    Peashooter
    Basic offensive plant that shoots peas at the nearest zombie in its row.
    Plant
     
    PlantController
    Controls plant behaviour each tick, delegating actions and notifying the GameEventListener of any state changes.
    PoleVaultingZombie
    Zombie that can leap over the first plant it encounters.
    PotatoMine
    Delayed explosive mine that arms after a short time and detonates on contact with a zombie.
    Sunflower
    Support plant that periodically generates sun resources.
    Tile
    Represents a single grid square on the board.
    TileClickController
    Handles mouse input on the game board and places or removes plants as requested by the player.
    TileLabel
    Custom JLabel that can display layered icons representing the background, house, plant and zombie for a single board tile.
    Wallnut
    Defensive plant that simply absorbs damage.
    Zombie
    Base class for all zombie types.
    ZombieController
    Handles spawning and movement logic for zombies.
